item.title: Worlds Best Steak Marinade
item.description: INGREDIENTS: 1/2 cup Balsamic Vinegar 1/4 Cup Soy Sauce 3 TBSP minced garlic 2 TBSP honey 2 TBSP olive oil 2 TSP ground black pepper 1 TSP Worcestershire Sauce 1 TSP Onion Powder INSTRUCTIONS:

item.title: Simple Steak Recipe
item.description: A Simple Steak Recipe. Click here See our cooking guide. INGREDIENTS: Steak Worcestershire sauce olive oil Garlic oregano Parsley thyme salt pepper Garlic butter INSTRUCTIONS: Cover the steaks in Garlic, oregano, Parsley, thyme, salt, pepper. Drip Worcestershire sauce and olive oil on the steaks. Rub oils and seasons on the steak, make sure to cover the sids. Place steaks in fridge and let sit for as log as you like.
